General.Name: PetroVietnam Fertilizer and Chemicals Corp
General.Description: PetroVietnam Fertilizer and Chemicals Corporation - JSC, together with its subsidiaries, produces and trades in fertilizers, liquid ammonia, industrial gas, and other chemical products for the agriculture, and oil and gas industries in Vietnam and internationally. It offers urea, NPK, MOP, SA, DAP, and other fertilizers. The company is also involved in the production, transition, and distribution of electricity; trading of real estate properties, land use rights held as owner, user, or lessor; wholesale of agricultural and forestry products, and living animals; processing oil and gas-related products and minerals; and loading and unloading of goods at seaports and inland terminals. In addition, it provides goods transportation services by road and by inbound waterways; and technical consultancy, architectural, vocational training, waterway transportation, shipping agency, and warehousing services, as well as acts as vessel agent. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. PetroVietnam Fertilizer and Chemicals Corporation - JSC is a subsidiary of Vietnam Oil and Gas Group.
